front.title: LDAPv3bis Suggestions: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3)

abstract.t: The protocol described in this document is designed to provide accessto directories supporting the X.500 models, while not incurring theresource requirements of the X.500 Directory Access Protocol (DAP).This protocol is specifically targeted at management applications andbrowser applications that provide read/write interactive access todirectories. When used with a directory supporting the X.500protocols, it is intended to be a complement to the X.500 DAP.
